__e: Now I don't want to scare anybody, but, uh, I believe that the trap that was set that got Irene, and the spear that had the message for us to get out...
You felt Irene was interested in me, so you killed George... Because you felt that was the best way to make sure she didn't get me.
Hopefully, we can... (Inhales, exhales) get to Irene and the others before it's too late.
Irene, I can't put my finger on it, but that name is familiar to me and important.
Does it seem weird that Irene's date hasn't shown up yet?
The second reason, and this is why I put on this old TV programme of ours, is because Irene went looking for something she didn't find and now I want you to look for it.
